text:
Car driver J. Alex Vijay (40), I. Rani (70) and J. Infant Mary (65), all from Irudhayapuram at Palakkarai in the city, died in a road accident at Ayyampalayam near Musiri on Wednesday. The women were proceeding in the car to Thottiyam when the vehicle collided head on with a Tiruchi bound bus from Salem.

The car driver and Rani died on the spot while Infant Mary succumbed to injuries at a private hospital here.

The Musiri police have registered a case.
title: Three die in road accident
